title: part of redevelopment shall not exceed the area that existed prior to redevelopment
clause_text: part of redevelopment shall not exceed the area that existed prior to redevelopment. Other social infrastructure like School, Dispensary and Gymnasium run by Public Authority or Charitable Trust that existed prior to the redevelopment shall be allowed without increase in existing area.
section: Aaganwadi, Health Centre / Outpost, Community Hall
